update pay_invoice_msg
pay_invoice_id = #{payInvoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payee_id = #{payeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payee_bank_card_id = #{payeeBankCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payee_bank_card_number = #{payeeBankCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payee_bank_subbranch_id = #{payeeBankSubbranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pay_status_msg = #{payStatusMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pay_invoice_msg set pay_invoice_id = #{payInvoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_id = #{payeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_bank_card_id = #{payeeBankCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_bank_card_number = #{payeeBankCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_bank_subbranch_id = #{payeeBankSubbranchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payee_bank_subbranch_name = #{payeeBankSubbranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount_payable = #{amountPayable,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, paid_amount = #{paidAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pay_status_msg = #{payStatusMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE pay_invoice_msg SET pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=BIT} WHERE pay_invoice_id = #{payInvoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND pay_time = ( SELECT a.maxTime FROM ( SELECT MAX(pay_time) maxTime FROM pay_invoice_msg WHERE pay_invoice_id = #{payInvoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) a )
